content:
XamlDebuggerXmlReader Class

In this Article

Provides the functionality to parse XAML markup code into an object or tree of objects.

Syntax

Declaration

public class XamlDebuggerXmlReader : System.Xaml.XamlReader, System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Xaml.XamlReader
  • XamlDebuggerXmlReader

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()
,
Close()
,
IsDisposed
,
ReadSubtree()
,
Skip()
,
IDisposable.Dispose()

Constructors summary

XamlDebuggerXmlReader(TextReader)

Initializes a new instance of the XamlDebuggerXmlReader class with the specified text reader.
XamlDebuggerXmlReader(TextReader,XamlSchemaContext)

Initializes a new instance of the XamlDebuggerXmlReader class with the specified text reader and schema context for interpreting or mapping XAML types.
XamlDebuggerXmlReader(XamlReader,TextReader)

Initializes a new instance of the XamlDebuggerXmlReader class with the specified XAML reader and text reader.
XamlDebuggerXmlReader(XamlReader,IXamlLineInfo,TextReader)

Initializes a new instance of the XamlDebuggerXmlReader class with the specified XAML reader, XAML line information, and text reader.

Fields summary

EndColumnName

The name of an attached property that represents the ending column of an activity element in its XAML form.
EndLineName

The name of an attached property that represents the ending line of an activity element in its XAML form.
FileNameName

The name of an attached property that represents the name of the file to be parsed.
StartColumnName

The name of an attached property that represents the starting column of the activity in its XAML form.
StartLineName

The name of an attached property that represents the starting line of the activity in its XAML form.

Properties summary

CollectNonActivitySourceLocation

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a non-activity source location is collected.
HasLineInfo

Gets a value that indicates whether line information is available.
IsEof

Gets a value that indicates whether the underlying reader has reached the end of the XAML file that is being parsed.
LineNumber

Gets the line in a XAML file that is currently being examined by the reader.
LinePosition

Gets the position of the line in a XAML file that is currently being examined by the XML reader.
Member

Gets the starting member of the document being parsed to the XAML member base.
Namespace

Gets the path that is used in the root element of the XAML document to establish a relationship between the XAML code and its schema.
NodeType

Gets the type of the node currently being read in a XAML file.
SchemaContext

Gets the schema context for the underlying XAML reader.
Type

Gets the record type at the XAML start node.
Value

Gets the element at the node currently being read.

Methods summary

CopyAttachedSourceLocation(Object,Object)

Retrieves row and column values from the specified activity object and assigns them to the current instance of the XAML reader.
Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources used by the XamlDebuggerXmlReader, and optionally, releases the managed resources.
GetEndColumn(Object)

Gets the value of the attached property named in the EndColumnName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
GetEndLine(Object)

Gets the value of the attached property named in the EndLineName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
GetFileName(Object)

Gets the value of the attached property named in the FileNameName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
GetStartColumn(Object)

Gets the value of the attached property named in the StartColumnName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
GetStartLine(Object)

Gets the value of the attached property named in the StartLineName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
Read()

Provides the next XAML node from the loaded source, if a XAML node is available.
SetEndColumn(Object,Object)

Sets the value of the attached property named in the EndColumnName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
SetEndLine(Object,Object)

Sets the value of the attached property named in the EndLineName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
SetFileName(Object,Object)

Sets the value of the attached property named in the FileNameName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
SetStartColumn(Object,Object)

Sets the value of the attached property named in the StartColumnName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.
SetStartLine(Object,Object)

Sets the value of the attached property named in the StartLineName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

Events summary

SourceLocationFound

Occurs when the source location is found.

Constructors

  • XamlDebuggerXmlReader(TextReader)

    Initializes a new instance of the XamlDebuggerXmlReader class with the specified text reader.

    public XamlDebuggerXmlReader (System.IO.TextReader underlyingTextReader);

    Parameters

    • underlyingTextReader
      TextReader

      The text reader to the underlying text data.

  • XamlDebuggerXmlReader(TextReader,XamlSchemaContext)

    Initializes a new instance of the XamlDebuggerXmlReader class with the specified text reader and schema context for interpreting or mapping XAML types.

    public XamlDebuggerXmlReader (System.IO.TextReader underlyingTextReader, System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext schemaContext);

    Parameters

    • underlyingTextReader
      TextReader

      The text reader to the underlying text data.

    • schemaContext
      XamlSchemaContext

      The schema context for interpreting or mapping XAML types.

  • XamlDebuggerXmlReader(XamlReader,TextReader)

    Initializes a new instance of the XamlDebuggerXmlReader class with the specified XAML reader and text reader.

    public XamlDebuggerXmlReader (System.Xaml.XamlReader underlyingReader, System.IO.TextReader textReader);

    Parameters

    • underlyingReader
      System.Xaml.XamlReader

      The XAML reader to the underlying XAML data.

    • textReader
      TextReader

      The text reader to the underlying text data.

  • XamlDebuggerXmlReader(XamlReader,IXamlLineInfo,TextReader)

    Initializes a new instance of the XamlDebuggerXmlReader class with the specified XAML reader, XAML line information, and text reader.

    public XamlDebuggerXmlReader (System.Xaml.XamlReader underlyingReader, System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo xamlLineInfo, System.IO.TextReader textReader);

    Parameters

    • underlyingReader
      System.Xaml.XamlReader

      The XAML reader to the underlying XAML data.

    • xamlLineInfo
      IXamlLineInfo

      The object that reports XAML line information.

    • textReader
      TextReader

      The text reader to the underlying text data.

Fields

  • EndColumnName

    The name of an attached property that represents the ending column of an activity element in its XAML form.

    public static readonly System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier EndColumnName;
  • EndLineName

    The name of an attached property that represents the ending line of an activity element in its XAML form.

    public static readonly System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier EndLineName;
  • FileNameName

    The name of an attached property that represents the name of the file to be parsed.

    public static readonly System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier FileNameName;
  • StartColumnName

    The name of an attached property that represents the starting column of the activity in its XAML form.

    public static readonly System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier StartColumnName;
  • StartLineName

    The name of an attached property that represents the starting line of the activity in its XAML form.

    public static readonly System.Xaml.AttachableMemberIdentifier StartLineName;

Properties

  • CollectNonActivitySourceLocation

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a non-activity source location is collected.

    public bool CollectNonActivitySourceLocation { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the non-activity source location is collected; otherwise, false.

  • HasLineInfo

    Gets a value that indicates whether line information is available.

    public bool HasLineInfo { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if line information is available; otherwise, false.

  • IsEof

    Gets a value that indicates whether the underlying reader has reached the end of the XAML file that is being parsed.

    public override bool IsEof { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the reader has reached the end of the file it is parsing; otherwise, false.

  • LineNumber

    Gets the line in a XAML file that is currently being examined by the reader.

    public int LineNumber { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The line in a XAML file that is currently being examined by the reader.

  • LinePosition

    Gets the position of the line in a XAML file that is currently being examined by the XML reader.

    public int LinePosition { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The position of the line in a XAML file that is currently being examined by the XML reader.

    Remarks

    Line position is also known as "Column" in some text editors or text editing metaphors.

  • Member

    Gets the starting member of the document being parsed to the XAML member base.

    public override System.Xaml.XamlMember Member { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlMember

      The starting member of the document being parsed to the XAML member base.

  • Namespace

    Gets the path that is used in the root element of the XAML document to establish a relationship between the XAML code and its schema.

    public override System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration Namespace { get; }

    Property Value

    • NamespaceDeclaration

      A namespace declaration for use in the root element of the XAML document.

  • NodeType

    Gets the type of the node currently being read in a XAML file.

    public override System.Xaml.XamlNodeType NodeType { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlNodeType

      One of the enumeration values of the XamlNodeType enumeration.

  • SchemaContext

    Gets the schema context for the underlying XAML reader.

    public override System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext SchemaContext { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlSchemaContext

      The schema context information.

  • Type

    Gets the record type at the XAML start node.

    public override System.Xaml.XamlType Type { get; }

    Property Value

    • XamlType

      A XAML record type.

  • Value

    Gets the element at the node currently being read.

    public override object Value { get; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      An element in an XAML file.

Methods

  • CopyAttachedSourceLocation(Object,Object)

    Retrieves row and column values from the specified activity object and assigns them to the current instance of the XAML reader.

    public static void CopyAttachedSourceLocation (object source, object destination);

    Parameters

    • source
      Object

      The XAML activity instance from which to read source location values.

    • destination
      Object

      An activity instance.

  • Dispose(Boolean)

    Releases the unmanaged resources used by the XamlDebuggerXmlReader, and optionally, releases the managed resources.

    protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);

    Parameters

    • disposing
      Boolean

      true to release the managed resources; otherwise, false.

  • GetEndColumn(Object)

    Gets the value of the attached property named in the EndColumnName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static object GetEndColumn (object instance);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      An activity instance.

    Returns

    • Object

      An attached property object.

  • GetEndLine(Object)

    Gets the value of the attached property named in the EndLineName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static object GetEndLine (object instance);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      An activity instance.

    Returns

    • Object

      An attached property object.

  • GetFileName(Object)

    Gets the value of the attached property named in the FileNameName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static object GetFileName (object instance);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      An activity instance.

    Returns

    • Object

      An attached property object.

  • GetStartColumn(Object)

    Gets the value of the attached property named in the StartColumnName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static object GetStartColumn (object instance);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      An activity instance.

    Returns

    • Object

      An attached property object.

  • GetStartLine(Object)

    Gets the value of the attached property named in the StartLineName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static object GetStartLine (object instance);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      An activity instance.

    Returns

    • Object

      An attached property object.

  • Read()

    Provides the next XAML node from the loaded source, if a XAML node is available.

    public override bool Read ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if a node is available; otherwise, false.

  • SetEndColumn(Object,Object)

    Sets the value of the attached property named in the EndColumnName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static void SetEndColumn (object instance, object value);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      The current instance of the XAML reader.

    • value
      Object

      The EndColumnName property identifier or name.

  • SetEndLine(Object,Object)

    Sets the value of the attached property named in the EndLineName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static void SetEndLine (object instance, object value);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      The current instance of the XAML reader.

    • value
      Object

      The EndLineName identifier or name.

  • SetFileName(Object,Object)

    Sets the value of the attached property named in the FileNameName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static void SetFileName (object instance, object value);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      The current instance of the XAML reader.

    • value
      Object

      The FileNameName property identifier or name.

  • SetStartColumn(Object,Object)

    Sets the value of the attached property named in the StartColumnName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static void SetStartColumn (object instance, object value);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      The current instance of the XAML reader.

    • value
      Object

      The StartColumnName property identifier or name.

  • SetStartLine(Object,Object)

    Sets the value of the attached property named in the StartLineName dependency property field of the specified instance of a XAML reader.

    public static void SetStartLine (object instance, object value);

    Parameters

    • instance
      Object

      The current instance of the XAML reader.

    • value
      Object

      The StartLineName property identifier or name.

Events

  • SourceLocationFound

    Occurs when the source location is found.

    public event EventHandler<System.Activities.Debugger.SourceLocationFoundEventArgs> SourceLocationFound;
